StaticMaps

Class StaticMaps

  • java.lang.Object
    • StaticMaps.MapsJava
      • StaticMaps.StaticMaps

  • public class StaticMaps
extends MapsJava
    This class contains static functions to create maps and get your image (Image format). These maps contain a marker in the center of that map.
    Author:
    Luis Marcos

      • getStaticMap

        public java.awt.Image getStaticMap(java.lang.String centerAddress,
                          int zoom,
                          java.awt.Dimension size,
                          StaticMaps.Maptype maptype)
                            throws java.net.MalformedURLException,
                                   java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Create a static map to the data shown in the different parameters of the function
        Parameters:
        centerAddress - center of the map to be created ("latitude, longitude")
        zoom - Sets the zoom level of the map, which determines the level of magnification. Values ​​0 worldwide and show greater than 21 show individual buildings
        size - map size that is generated
        maptype - defines the type of map that will generate
        Returns:
        Returns a static map image with the associated. On error, returns null
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        See Also:
        Format, StaticMaps.Maptype
